Rope Suspension Clamp (Top)

Secure ladder step attachment for enhanced vertical lifeline system installation

Premium Quality
Smart Design

The Rope Suspension Clamp (Top) is designed for secure attachment to ladder steps in vertical lifeline systems. It simplifies and speeds up the ladder installation process while offering enhanced durability and resistance to wear. Its sturdy construction ensures long-term reliability in demanding safety applications, providing a secure connection point for rope suspension in vertical fall protection systems.

Standard: EN 795 : 2012
Material: AISI 304
Working Load: 12 kN
Breaking Strength: 25 kN
Component Code: HVLC-07
Talk to a Safety Expert

Key Features

Certified Safety
EN 795:2012
Ladder Mount
Step attachment

Fast mounting
